page.title: 03BLYTH RECOLLECTIONS. (2)
page.content: {Changes in everyday life in Blyth.} The television was a big change.The women go to work now but before they stopped to do the housework.Today most people have cars and telephones. { {Street Scenes 20 years ago.} The village is tidier now and there are more trees.60 years ago all the cottages had flower gardens in the front and hanging plants in the window.The pavements were cobblestone. { {Use of the motor car.} The motor car made many changes to Blyth because on Sundays it is very busy because of the market and the people go out in their cars.People that live in Blyth who have cars can travel very far to work.People cannot join in with the village things because they work too far away.
